meanings.definition: The quality or state of being bountiful.
meanings.sent1: Her bountifulnesses in sharing always made everyone smile.
meanings.sent2: The bountifulnesses of the harvest brought joy to the farmers.
meanings.sent3: The bountifulnesses of the buffet left no one hungry.
meanings.sent4: His bountifulnesses of kindness overflowed like a river.
meanings.sent5: The bountifulnesses of her heart were evident in every gesture.

meanings.definition: The act of being generous or plentiful.
meanings.sent1: Their bountifulnesses in giving helped many in need.
meanings.sent2: The bountifulnesses of gifts during the holidays warmed hearts.
meanings.sent3: The bountifulnesses of treats at the party delighted all guests.
meanings.sent4: Her bountifulnesses of time made her a cherished friend.
meanings.sent5: The bountifulnesses of nature's beauty surrounded them on the hike.
